API_TOKENS.description: If no api-token is set, you only get ~50 requests/hour. Generate a token at https://github.com/settings/tokens, and input here. You can use a comma-separated list of tokens to increase your rate-limit.

UNRESTRICTED.description: Allow profile summary to be built for any GitHub profile. Summary creation of large profiles can quickly consume your API request limit.

GTM_ID.description: Provide a Google Tag Manager ID to enable GTM.
